cypher_method

Class Rotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cypher_method.Rotor

  • class Rotor
extends java.lang.Object
    One rotor that will increment and shuffle/permute all the letters The permute process works like this : Get the position of the char in the alphabet. Return the char at this position in the rotor composition. The permute inverse process is just the same but the other way.
    Author:
    JHER

      • increment

        protected boolean increment()
        Increment the rotor. If it reach 26, then it has done a whole rotation and it has to return at it 0 position.
        Returns:
        true if the rotor made a whole rotation
